pkgmetadata.longdescription: Genome Synteny Visualization // Draw syntenic relationships between genome assemblies. There are 3 functions which take a tab delimited file containing alignment data for syntenic blocks between genomes to produce either a linear alignment plot, an evolution highway style plot, or a painted ideogram representing syntenic relationships. There is also a function to convert alignment data in the DESCHRAMBLER/inferCAR format to the required data structure.
